Subject: Restarting Heritrix 3.0.0 keeps failing

Hi,

we are using Heritrix 3.0.0 to crawl snaphshots of about 500 Web-Sites=
. Now I had to restart the Heritrix Engine. As I don't know the recommended=
 way to stop the engine I "killed" it via its process number (with signal 1=
5).

The problem now is: I cannot restart the engine. When starting the eng=
ing with "bin/heritrix -a admin:admin" the progress dots appear enlessly.

=
Any ideas what I can do to start the engine again?

What is the recommended=
 way to shut down the Crawler?

Cheers,
Tino
